title: PBE
body: When it's time to create your account in PBE?

replies.body:
You can create your PBE account once you've been accepted for access. You should receive any email once that happens. 

For complete deets on the PBE, check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
